description: Grants the user the power to create, control, and transform into lightning at will, making them a Lightning Human. The user can discharge varying voltages of electricity, travel as lightning, and pick up electromagnetic waves to enhance their observation abilities.

users.circumstances: Enel ate the fruit prior to destroying his homeland of Birka and conquering Skypiea

abilityReveals.description: The user can transform their body into lightning, granting intangibility to non-insulated attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Enel demonstrates his lightning powers when casually attacking his priests out of boredom.

abilityReveals.description: The user can discharge electricity at varying voltages to shock opponents, ranging from 1 million to 200 million volts.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Enel uses his lightning to attack the priests, demonstrating his overwhelming offensive power.

abilityReveals.description: By picking up electromagnetic waves from the air, the user can extend the range of their observation abilities to cover vast distances.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Referenced when Enel demonstrates knowledge of events happening across Skypiea.

weaknesses.weakness: Rubber insulation - completely ineffective against rubber
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim in water

strengths.description: User can become lightning to avoid physical attacks.

strengths.strength: Extreme destructive power with voltages up to 200 million volts
strengths.description: One of the most powerful offensive Devil Fruits.
User can travel vast distances by becoming lightning.
Can melt and reshape metal like gold through electrical heating.
